Text:
you beautiful beautiful pirate! gonna seed this forever soon as she comes down. lost my cd of the eponymous album, sadly deleted now. you should be sainted for this. much love and respect. you don.t happen to have Hardland as well?
Thankyou so much.

thank you so much for this... bothy culture is one of my favourite albums ever...  these are such special albums, both of them... (i've never said this before on a torrent comment but...)  much love mate :)
